Title: Action Game / Hero Killing / Phantom Assasin

ItemTooltips.stout_shield: Nice item when don't take your passive-evasion
ItemTooltips.lifesteal: Just lifesteal. Good choice when you need lifesteal and nothing more,.
ItemTooltips.clarity: Sometimes we need mana on dagger/blink
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: When you have advantage on lane, you buy it and kill all MAP, +24 damage and +ms when you running for kill makes you best killer EU.
ItemTooltips.power_treads: You can take it when you need someHPs. In general, item let you good stats.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: A lot of good item. Working on team, let you armor, mp+hp regen, lifesteal
ItemTooltips.bfury: I said in description - i don't like this item. For example take situation: you farming bf and end it in 14 mins, on enemy SafeLane void or jugger too take it - you will lose. That just my opinion, if you know - you can take it.
ItemTooltips.helm_of_the_dominator: Lifesteal is nice choice for mortred. With her creets and lifesteal we can living in fight very long, so make you as good teamfighter.
ItemTooltips.mask_of_madness: I guess, this is only situation item. You should know when you can buy this, cause for it -you will take +30 extra damage. For example: MoM turn on, you walking to fight and lina kill you from one laguna blade. Not nice, agree.
